name: OutRun (itch) (Vincent Reynier)
description:
OutRun is a prototype for a 3D First-Person Platformer. The game includes 7 fast-paced levels. Run, jump, and use the various types of platforms to reach the portal at the end of each level. Try to beat all the par times !

The game is playable with keyboard and mouse or with an Xbox controller

Controls (Keyboard / Controller):

  • Move : WASD / Left Stick
  • Look around : Mouse / Right Stick
  • Jump : Spacebar / A   (Hold down and release for a charged jump)
  • Pause : Escape / Start
